Aotearoa Youth Figures

See data

Find data for and about young people in Aotearoa

Improve wellbeing through better, data-informed decisions.

Brought to you by

Welcome to Aotearoa Youth Figures.

Aotearoa Youth Figures brings together data, research and reports for young people in Aotearoa. You can access data from reputable sources that is free for you to take and use.

Find data on young people's wellbeing, employment, education, health, and more. You can also read reports that contain data about young people in NZ and other topics.

Data empowers us

To work towards a better future for young people in Aotearoa, we need to build compelling, evidence-backed stories to advocate for change.

Data is a vital tool to help us understand, measure, manage, and assess issues and the impact of the changes we make.

  • Explore topics and charts

    Choose a topic to explore youth data in charts or tables, and read data definitions.

    See topics

  • Read reports and presentations

    Get information that supports your use of data and provides a deeper understanding of young people's lives in Aotearoa through the lens of data

    Find reports
